author: xtqqczze
body: Fix [CA2213: Disposable fields should be disposed](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2213) in `System.Management.Automation.CommandPathSearch`.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: CodeFactor "complex method" issues are false positives, see #15721.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Can we enable the rule explicitly?

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> Can we enable the rule explicitly?

We can enable `CA2213` as `suggestion`, but it will be noisy, as there are many violations.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> > Can we enable the rule explicitly?
> 
> We can enable `CA2213` as `suggestion`, but it will be noisy, as there are many violations.

This raises concerns.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> > > Can we enable the rule explicitly?
> > 
> > 
> > We can enable `CA2213` as `suggestion`, but it will be noisy, as there are many violations.
> 
> This raises concerns.

Issue opened: #15803.

title: Fix IDisposable implementation in `CommandPathSearch`
